explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between excess cash and corporate financial performance, analyzing factors such as investment opportunities, business risk, and agency costs. It uses dynamic regression models (two-step system generalized method of moments) for data analysis. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, neural networks, or other AI techniques are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract. The research is grounded in financial and economic analysis rather than computational or machine learning methods.
